other_tests.findings: Insufficient suppression of serum cortisol concentration in reaction to 1 mg dexamethasone.
Alterations in receptor number or ligand affinity and/or the ability of DEX to inhibit mitogen-induced cell proliferation in all patients investigated.
No GR gene alterations were found in the patients.
Elevated serum cortisol levels with normal circadian rhythm; insufficient suppression in response to DEX.
Inability of DEX to inhibit mitogen-induced cell proliferation.
